resources.string: Everyone crashes Some get back on Some don’t Some can\u0027t. - Hunter S. Thompson
Good time, good friend, good wheel. - Unknown
Any day is a good day to leave some miles behind. - Foster Kinn
Harley Davidson\u0027s first motorcycle proves that indeed after failure comes success. - Unknown
I hate being sexy but I’m a biker so I can’t help it. - Unknown
Life is Short So grip it and rip it. - Unknown
Make noise with your Harley Davidson bike and work in silence to achieve it. - Unknown
Run the race of life at your own pace. - Unknown
I actually have no aspirations to ride a motorcycle ever again. It’s exhausting. You get cold. - Ally Walker
I carry groceries home on the tank of my motorcycle. - Stephan Jenkins
They say treat yourself right, so I bought a Harley Davidson bike for myself. - Unknown
Yes, I\u0027m addicted to my bike because It\u0027s way better than being addicted to fake love. - Unknown
I don\u0027t love the people driving fast, That\u0027s the reason why I overtake them. - Unknown
I don\u0027t need you my bike is enough drive me crazy. - Anonymous
I have a lot of respect for the bikers, which I\u0027ve always had. - Emilio Rivera
I have discovered biker paradise. It is called the Great Smoky Mountains. - Foster Kinn
I look my best when i take my helmet off after a long motorcycle ride. I have a glow and a bit of helmet hair. - Eric Bana
It was only a motorcycle but it felt like a mode of being. - Rachel Kushner
Let\u0027s ride hard towards your goal. - Brajesh Kumar Singh
Nothing compares to the simple pleasure of a bike ride. - John F. Kennedy
The road listens. It believes in you. - Foster Kinn
The road never ends \u2026 only our vision does. - Amit Reddy
For us, every ride is a date, every destination a memory. - Anonymous
The bad boy quality of a biker is irresistible. - Anonymous
Our love story began with the kickstart of a motorcycle. - Anonymous
Two hearts, two wheels, one endless journey. - Anonymous
Riding together is like a dance where the road is our music. - Anonymous
The element of danger in riding only makes our bond stronger. - Anonymous
Every motorcycle ride with you feels like a romantic novel. - Anonymous
